Selectize

Selectize is the hybrid of a textbox and <select> box. It's jQuery-based and it's useful for tagging, contact lists, country selectors, and so on.

Single Item Select
Tagging
Option Groups

Date Time Picker

Default Datepicker

Use data-plugin="timepicker" create a basic timepicker.

Date Range

Using the input-daterange construct with multiple child inputs will instantiate one picker per input and link them together to allow selecting ranges.

to
Inline Date Picker

Instantiating the datepicker on a simple div will give an embedded picker that is always visible
